"Just when I decide to play William Tell with her she disappears off the face of the Netherworld. I can't tell if she actually found some self preservation or got lost on one of her love quests."

'That little brat Laharl better not taken my dessert again!' The red head thinks to herself as she opens the fridge door...

...and sees a mold of shivering gelatin making muffle cries.

'Well, I knew I forgot about something.' Etna berates herself as she takes the mold out and flips it onto a nearby plate. She pulls it out to reveal a beautiful gelatin dessert of mixed colors across its surface, and a familiar pair of teary red eyes looking at her.

"Miss Etna, you've finally remember about me!" Surprising Flonne was able to retain her speech despite having no mouth. "It was so cold, cramp, and dark in there, it was scary!"

Etna at least had the decency to scratch her cheek in embarrassing at her callousness, "Uh, yeah, my bad." Etna that notice that Flonne had some level of movement, "So Flonne, you able to do something with yourself, like make a body or something?"

"I don't know, maybe." The gelatin returns, "I was in there for so long I actually felt myself harden."

"Again, my bad."

With a glare (more like the equivalent of a eye pout) Flonne looks at the still humanoid demon across her. "At first I thought I should let you go through the same thing considering how good it felt, but now I want you to go through the same thing I did Miss Etna!"

"I don't know if I should be surprise at your revenge plot or that you actually have a vengeful bone in your body." Etna deadpans.

"I wish I do have my bones and body."

"Touche, and again, my bad."

Flonne glares (eye pouts) even further before going back to struggling to do with her gelatin form. She could...maybe...just a little chance, be able to make some sort of form to give her some level of mobility. However it was an up hill battle, she didn't know how long she's been cooling inside that mold, she might be stuck as a dessert. For the fallen angel, the thought of being a sentient dessert in front a sweet tooth demon like Etna was not a comforting thought in the slightest.

After a few minutes of concentration Etna sees that...
1141121121.title: Flonne Brand Gelatin

choices: She jumps off the box as Flonne reaches the top.
1141121122.content:
Eventually, Etna finds what she's looking for: A plastic box that's about as tall as Flonne would usually be and is equally as long on each side. "Oh, this will do nicely!" says Etna, before she pours Flonne into the box. Flonne yelps as she sloshes around in the container, filling it up about a quarter of the way.

"Can you at least tell me what you have in mind, Miss Etna?" asks Flonne soon after she becomes mostly still.

Etna hops up and holds onto the side of the box, and peeks over the edge to take a look at Flonne. "Heheh, don't worry too much about it, Flonne, you'll know what's going on soon enough~" She then hops down and starts to roll the box over to where the dimensional transporter is. She's asked where she'll be going, but she says she'll set the destination herself as to keep where she's planning on taking Flonne a surprise.

The first hint as to where they are is a sudden coldness, made more intense due to her not having much in the way of insulation besides the box she's sloshing about in. "Ah...it's so cold..." says Flonne, as she starts to recognize the sky. It then comes back to her, of course she knows where this is, this is the Frozen River area. "Ah! This is where I first joined up with you!"

Etna smiles. "Nice, you remember! Heheh, think of this as an unofficial anniversary, Flonne~. Plus...I didn't want to go somewhere too cold, since I want you to fill up as much of this container as possible before you start to freeze."

"Ah...f-freeze? And...huh! It does seem like I'm a little higher in the container than I was before, how's this even happening, Miss Etna?" asks Flonne, her curiosity rising.

"Well, to make it simple, fluid things like to expand as they're about to freeze or boil, and you're getting closer to the first one." Etna explains, as she takes a peek over the edge to see how Flonne is doing. She notes that Flonne is up to the halfway point of the container. "Looks like you're getting there, Flonne!"

As this progresses, Flonne feels herself getting colder. "Brrr...every last drop of me feels so icy cold...and it actually feels really nice...especially when it comes in a wave. In fact...I feel o- " she says, being suddenly interrupted by a sudden cold wave going through her, which causes Flonne to shiver intensely. "M-m-m-m-m-m-m-mmmmm! Hehehe, just like that!" Flonne says, giggling a little as her body still wobbles from shivering.

Etna grins as she sits on the edge of the box, looking Flonne over. "Heh, it won't be long until you're a nice big ice cube, then." says Etna, as her tail is close enough to dip it into Flonne's icy body. Suddenly...
1141121122.title: Back To Where It Began

choices: The rest of her sinks into Flonne's body.
11411211222.content:
Etna tries to jump off the box to be able to get Flonne completely freezes, but she loses her balance and suddenly starts to fall into the box. At this point, Flonne's body is rather viscous, so instead of making a splash, she hits Flonne's surface with a loud plop and sinks into Flonne's frozen body up to her chest.

"Oh no, Miss Etna! Are you alright?!" exclaims Flonne, concerned that what's good for her might not be so good for Etna.

Etna nods, and tries to hold her arms out to keep aloft. She's not sure how deep she'll end up sinking, and at the moment she doesn't really want to find out. Etna feels like Flonne's body is trying to swallow her, since it's trying to push down on Etna's more dense body.

Soon, Etna's arms start to falter. "G-geez...this cold is making my arms weak. I can't hold on any longer!" she says, as she's forced to relax her arms. This causes Etna to sink further in, up to only her head and hands. She can't even move the rest of her body, which still feels like it's being pushed on by Flonne's body. After struggling for a little, the feeling of being pressed downward starts to be a pleasant one for her, almost relaxing, in fact, and after all her struggling she certain feels like relaxing, even if it means she ends up completely submerged in Flonne's body.

"Heh...I'm getting exhausted, Flonne, so I think I'll just sink right in and get comfortable~" says Etna. Flonne offers no objections as Etna stops struggling entirely. The moment she does...
11411211222.title: She falls into the box.

choices: Stretch her head out as well.
Make her as thin as thread.
114112112222.content:
As Etna relaxes, she feels every part of her that has sunken into Flonne are getting tugged on even more, while her hands and head still stick out of the surface. She feels like she's being consistently tugged on with enough force to cause her body to stretch out. Flonne is able to feel it too in the form of her body having more contact with Etna.

"Oooh...this feels nice, it certainly beats completely sinking in~" says Etna. She then feels her feet touch the bottom of the container. And then, she feels a new sensation, that of her feet starting to spread across the bottom of the container. "W-whoa! Geez, it feels like my feet are getting really wide and flat!"

Flonne giggles. "It feels like more of you is in contact with me, Miss Etna! It's not a problem, is it?"

Etna grins, as her stretched out feet continue to get pressed between Flonne and the bottom of the container. "Heh, I was just surprised, that's all, this actually feels pretty awesome~" she says, as her feet spread out all along the bottom of the box. Her arms have also been stretching the entire time, but not straight to the bottom, causing them to get stretched out a lot more on their way to the bottom. As her legs start to become the next part of her to be squashed along the bottom, Etna's arms start to feel like they're floating upward. Etna sees something stringy start to surface, and realizes quickly that it's her arms, stretched out so thinly that they're just barely thicker than thread. She gets her fingers around a part of her arms that has flowed close to them and rolls it between them.

She shivers in delight as she feels her wire-thin arm twist as if it was made of rubber. "Ahhh...amazing~. I hope a lot more of me gets stretched out like this. Heh, I'm sure you'll be able to handle that, Flonne~" she says, as she feels her arms continue to stretch out even more.

This makes Flonne giggle. "Alright! I'll see what I can do, Miss Etna!" she gleefully exclaims. While her control over her body is limited, it's enough to be able to move Etna's body around so that it doesn't stretch straight down.

"Ooooh...heh, you really know how to move me, Flonne~" says Etna in a flirty way. Flonne giggles, and continues to move Etna's body around. As Etna's body from her legs to her neck start to get thinner, Flonne starts simply bumping the more dense parts that are floating back down upward.

Etna becomes especially excited when she starts to see more than just her continually stretching arms begin to stay at the surface. Not long after that starts happening, more of Etna's body starts to rapidly float up to the surface on it's own. As Etna's body forms into a loose mesh along Flonne's surface, both girls seem to be pleased with how this is going. Etna in particular feels great, as she feels like her body stretches for miles.

"Ahhhhh...now this is more like it! Everything but my head and feet are all stretched out~." says Etna, as her head gently bobs in the middle of Flonne's body.

Flonne then starts to get an idea. "You know, Miss Etna, I think I might be able to stretch you out even more!" she exclaims gleefully.

Etna smirks. "Oooh, well, by all means, go ahead~"
114112112222.title: Stretched Thin

choices: Make Miss Etna completely wire thin from head ot toe.
1141121122221.content:
Etna feels Flonne tug on her head a bit, which causes a bit of it to sink under the surface. Immediately she feels the part of her head that went under starts to stretch out like the rest of her body. "Oooh...so you're going to stretch out everything but my feet, then? Mmm...I love the way you think, Flonne~"

Flonne giggles as she keeps gently pulling Etna's head under. "I knew you would, Miss Etna, after all, it's all that's left to stretch out!"

As Etna hears this, she smirks a bit. "Well, almost everything. There are these flat feet of mine, but you'd probably be left with a lot less of me rubbing up next to you, but I think they would end up stretching out nice and long too~" suggests Etna.

Flonne takes a moment to think about if she'd really want to do that.
1141121122221.title: Stretch her head out as well.

choices: Flonne can do it on her own.
11411211222211.content:
Flonne giggles. "If including your feet is what you want, Miss Etna, I'll be more than happy to do so!" she says, as she starts to pull the part of Etna's body that's connected to her feet as well. Etna's eyes light up as she sees and feels a lot more of her made as thin as string. Seeing this, she relaxes and shuts her eyes as that part of her head gets pulled under. Before long, every last bit of Etna's head has been stretched out, and now Flonne is focusing on stretching out her feet, which thanks to the earlier flattening are getting stretched longer than even her legs.

It takes a while with her feet, but after a while Flonne has completely stretched Etna out into a very long string. "And there we go, Miss Etna, you are now a string girl!" Flonne exclaims as Etna floats atop her.

"Mmmm...this feels wonderful, Flonne~, thanks for doing this for me." says Etna, her body wriggling with delight. "I'm really liking this form~"

Something then comes to Flonne's mind. "Ah, Miss Etna, speaking of forms, I seem to have a lot of control over my body now. Do you think I might have enough control to mold myself into something?"

This seems to catch Etna's interest. "Hum...maybe...and even if you can't, maybe once I start to get used to this form I'll be able to do the molding for you." Etna says.

Of course, for the first order of business, Flonne had to get them out of the box. She manages to get the box to rock back and forth enough for Flonne to be freed from the box. She plops out of the box looking like a cube, and for the most part stays that way for now. "Brr...I was getting so cozy in the box that I forgot how cold it was."

Etna chuckles. "Mmm, I'm still nice and cozy, though~" she says.

"Hehe, anyway, let's see if I can do this." says Flonne, as she prepares to try to change her shape.
11411211222211.title: Etna the Living String

choices: Etna ties her up and waits for her to wake up
11413.content:
Etna then says to Flonne. "Well you see I was just joking before, I really just wanna test a spell and need help." Flonne just says. "Um ok what did you need?" Etna whispers back "A subject." After a second or two of chanting green energy flows from her hand hitting Flonne in the face. "Well I don't feel so good, did it work." Etna purrs "But it worked just fine, you're just gonna fall asleep."

So what does Etna do with Flonne?
11413.title: Helpless lil' angel

choices: ...the ancient library.  Maybe there's some cool things in there."
...the arcade room.  Maybe we can find some fun games."
...the towers.  Who knows what's up there? We hardly ever go there."
...Laharl's bedroom.  Maybe we can find a secret of his or two? ;)"
...yeah, I dunno. *sweatdrops*  Do you know any places, Miss Etna?"
14.content:
Flonne suddenly shot up, her eyes ablaze with inspiration. "I know! How about we both explore around the castle some?"

         Etna looked at the fallen angel as if she had just suggested the two of them joining the Prism Rangers. "...uh, Flonne, why the heck would we want to do that? In case you've forgotten, we LIVE here - In fact, I've been living here longer than you have."

          Flonne responded, "Exactly. We live in a CASTLE! There's bound to be some cool places hidden here, right?" She clenched her fists together in excitement. "Just think of all the amazing things that could be here!"

          Etna countered, "Not really. As I've said before, I've been living here longer than you have, and I haven't seen anything even remotely interesting in my time here."
Flonne turned to her demoness friend and asked, "Have you even looked?", surprisingly skeptical, especially for her.
Etna defensively replied, "Yes! Of course I have, who wouldn't?"
"......really?"
Etna paused for a moment.......then she sighed, defeated. "....no...."
"Then wouldn't it be fun to go explore?", Flonne asked.
Etna sighed again. "Sure, why not?"

          Flonne suddenly hugged Etna, then let go just as quickly. "YAAAAAAY!!!! We're gonna explore a CASTLE!!!!"
Etna lazily asked, "So where are we going then, Einstein? Or have you even thought of a place where to begin?"
Now it was Flonne's turn to be defensive. "Of course I have! Why wouldn't I have? After all, I suggested it, didn't I?"

"Well, then where do ya wanna explore?", Etna replied.

Flonne answered, " Well, I was thinking about going to.....
14.title: Exploring Overlord Laharl's castle. (...uh-oh....)

142.content:
Etna blinks for a moment. "Wait, what? Arcade room? Why would we even have something like that here?" asks Etna, wondering if Flonne is more high on life than she usually is.

Flonne giggles. "Well yeah, of course we do! I wouldn't have suggested something that doesn't exist!"

"Knowing you, Flonne, you'd probably suggest something that's only in that airy little head of yours." says Etna. "But, I'll bite, let's go see this 'Arcade room', then."

Ignoring the insult, Flonne giggles with enthusiasm. "Now then, we need to actually find it! I know I saw it, I just forgot where..."

Etna can't help but facepalm at this. "Oh well, we've got nothing better to do anyway, let's get moving, then." With that, the two girls wander around in search of something that may or may not be a figment of Flonne's active imagination.

Eventually, the girls find a light source that's brighter than what is normal for the castle. "Ah, those lights look like the lights used for the arcade! This must be it!" Flonne says, as she runs ahead of Etna. Etna runs after Flonne in order to prevent Flonne from absentmindedly trigger what might be a trap for all they know.

Etna looks over the entrance while Flonne eyes light up from all the pretty lights. "So, you've been inside, right? I mean, I'm sure you wouldn't think this place is an arcade just from the entrance, but I just want to make sure."

This seems to frustrate Flonne just a little. "Come on, Miss Etna, give me some credit! I know things besides arcades use pretty lighting like this! Like theaters, and..."

Etna interrupts. "...and Arcades and elaborate traps, right?"

"Exactly!" says Flonne. "And all of those things could be fun, but I'm sure this is an arcade! Or...maybe it's an arcade that's an elaborate trap...or a theater that's an arcade, or even a theater arcade that's an elaborate trap?"

Etna shrugs, knowing Flonne's moments away from running in anyway. "Well, what are we waiting for, then? That trap's not going to trigger itself."
142.title: Those Options are All Traps, Unless They Are Not

1421.content:
Upon investigating the lights the two were greeted with the sight of a grand room filled to the brim with arcade games and other gimmicks.

Etna quirks an eyebrow, "Well I'll give you this you space case, at least you're right about the arcade trap thing."

Flonne however was already taken in by the arcade's bright lights and game sounds to even here her demon friends compliment.

"Welcome to Nethercade." A polite voice comes from next to Etna, shocking the demon girl to almost out of her skin.

"Woah what the?" Etna turns to find, to much of her surprise, a maid standing next to her with a warm smile on her face. Shaking out of her shock Etna gives the maid a questioning look, "Who are you, what are you doing here, and what the heck is this place?"

The maid only giggles before bowing a bit, "Forgive my manners, my name is Igasa. I am a maid task in the management of the Nethercade."

"Okay I see...I think." Etna responds before looking at the arcade, "So the Nethercade right? How is it that I've never heard of it?"

The maid's face soon turns pale, yet she still retains her smile, "Nobody actually comes to the arcade anymore."

The demoness backs away a bit from the aura of gloom radiating off the maid, "Right, sorry I ask. So you don't mind me checking this place out a bit?"

Igasa's face soon regains its color before the maid shakes her head no, "I do not mind at all. Arcades were meant for enjoyment." She points, "Why don't you ask your friend?"

Etna turns around in the direction Igasa was pointing to find Flonne playing what looks like a fighting game.

Etna sighs a bit, "How that ditz lived this far is a miracle beyond words. Thanks Igasa." She soon proceeds on over to the arcade.

Igasa bows a bit, "Please, do enjoy yourselves." The smile on her face soon turns slightly devious. "Please do."

"AND WAH-CHA!" Flonne shouts as delivers a twenty five hit combo to deplete her opponent's health guage down to zero.

"You look like you're having fun Flonne." Etna says as she joins up with her friend.

Flonne turns towards the red hair with stars in her eyes, "THIS PLACE IS SO AMAZING, WE'VE GOT TO CHECK OUT EVERYTHING!"

Etna giggles a bit to herself, "All right slow down you air head, now let's see what's good around here?" Looking around Etna tries to find any game of interest. Her gaze soon focuses on...
1421.title: Welcome to the Nethercade

1423.content:
Flonne and Etna enter whatever the place is and are greeted by a bright light out of nowhere. When the light dies down, the two of them do not seem to be where they were just a minute ago. Their location looks nothing like where they just were, nor does it look like an Arcade or a Theater, or anything remotely recreational.

"Ah...this isn't an arcade at all!" exclaims Flonne.

Etna sweatdrops. "Yeah, it was in the first paragraph, Flonne, but fourth wall smashing aside, we need to find out where this is."

"I...can't see anything at all, really. It looks so gray and bleak...it really could use some flowers, and a whole lot of other plants, too!" she says, as a picturesque meadow comes to her mind.

Etna laughs. "It's always flowers with you, huh?" Etna says, moments before a tree pops up under her. She shouts as the tree tosses her in the air and she lands ungracefully on a mushroom that conveniently appeared moments before she lands. She looks around to see the picturesque meadow Flonne was picturing. "Flonne, how long have you been able to do this?" asks Etna.

Flonne apparently still has meadow on the brain and nowhere else. "Do what?" Flonne says, then notices the beautiful countryside she created in her mind. "Oh! Much better!" she says gleefully.

"Yeah, I guess you wouldn't be surprised by a forest out of nowhere." snarks Etna.

Flonne shakes her head. "Oh no, I'm very surprised, but it's a good surprise!" exclaims Flonne. "I wonder if this place grants your heart's desire? That would be so cool!"

Etna shrugs. "If it's really something like that, we'd probably be doing something more interesting than getting tossed around by a tree out of nowhere."

"Yeah, it could be very specific about what can be done, or even who can change things around? Maybe you're just not picturing it well enough?" Flonne speculates.

"Picturing it, huh...hum..." she says, thinking of some way to play on one of her traits.
1423.title: Wishes Do Come True

14232.content: "Hum...she's always so carefree and bubbly...now what can I do with that..." Etna thinks, as Flonne's attention is currently on a colorful butterfly that decided to wander by.
14232.title: Bubbly?

choices: Etna and Flonne find something perverted in Laharl's bedroom...
Etna and Flonne find Jennifer in Laharl's bedroom...
144.content:
"I think we should peek around in Laharl's room!" Flonne chirped.

"Oooh~! How evil!" Etna grinned.

Flonne gasped. "AH! Y-you're right..." tears started to well up in her eyes. "WAAA~AAH!" she wept, "I don't wanna be evil!"

SMACK! Etna slapped the fallen angel on the back of the head. "Get a hold of yourself, sheesh! What do you think you are, an angel?"

Flonne sniffled. "... y-yes...?" she said uncertainly.

"LIKE, WRONG-O!" Etna smacked Flonne a second time. "Now let's get going, already, Li'l Miss Flower Girl. After all, who knows what kind of naughty stuff we might find in the prince's room?" Etna insisted.

Flonne perked up. "Oh my goodness, you're right!" she exclaimed, "We must make sure that Laharl isn't getting his innocent young mind corrupted!"

"...innocent...?" Etna sighed. "I guess once a love freak, always a love freak," she shrugged before following after her exuberant senior.
144.title: Morals, Schmorals

145.content: Uncertain of where to go, the 2 demons begin walking around the large castle and find themselves in a hallway?
145.title: A hallway? Maybe?

1451.content:
Etna: Whatever, lets just start walking, who knows, maybe we'll find something interesting that way.
Flonne: Alright! And thats a very positive way of thinking! I'm sure we will find something to help us pass the time!
Etna, with an annoyed look, "......yeah.....".

They are walking for over 10 minutes and find themselves in some random hallway.

Flonne: Where are we?
Etna: I have no idea. Even I've never been here.
Flonne: This place is bigger than I thought!

A few more steps down the creepy hall and Flonne triggers a trap on the floor. They watch as the stone sinks into the floor, then look at each other. Flonne smiles, and says, "heh....oops".

The floor suddenly opens up beneath Etna and she falls into the pit, but not before saying, "Flonne you idiot!".

With the 2 of them now separated, what happens?
1451.title: Separated.

14511.content:
Etna ends up falling onto a slide, as she continues down the dark tunnel, twisting and turning here and there, she has no idea where it was taking her. It spits her out into some room, in the air, and she falls and lands on her ass.

"Ow!", she says, getting to her feet, with 1 hand on her butt, "Now where am I?".

A sweet smell suddenly surrounds her, she gets a better look around and finds herself in the kitchen of what looks like a bakery. There are all kinds of baked goods, from pies, to breads, to cookies, and so much more, as well as prinnies with chef hats running here and there.

Etna: Why did it take me here?

She starts to look around the kitchen.....
14511.title: Follow Etna.

1452.content:
Ugh, what's with this castle!?!" Etna yells, getting frustrated by the predicament she and Flonne were in.

However, Flonne tried to calm down Etna's spontaneous temper tantrum as she said, "Etna, please calm down. It's not exactly that bad." Even though Flonne calmed her down, Etna was still blowing out some fumes.

Trying to have a good time with Etna, the fallen angel Flonne then noticed 3 large doors ahead of them and asked, "Any chance we can see what's behind those doors, Etna?" "Oh sure, get us even more lost by going through one of those doors!" Etna sarcastically replied, as Flonne grabbed Etna's hand and dragged the young succubus with her toward the 3 doors.

Choice I: A large pink door in the shape of a teddy bear

Choice II: A large blue door in the shape of a circle

Choice III: A large door in the shape of a catgirl
1452.title: Numerous Doors

choices: Enta & Flonne split up to investigate the strange place
Etna and Flonne stay together for their own safety
14521.content:
When Etna and Flonne opened the Teddy Bear Door, they were in a completely different area of the castle.

The entire area had a bright and babyish feel to it, as it was completely different from the rest of the castle. The walls were a baby pink and the ceilings were white, as there were multiple rooms inside this large house-like area that both Etna and Flonne have entered.

Etna looked around and was disgusted by the location she and Flonne were at, as she let her tongue in disgust and said, "BLEH! What kind of demon would have a place like this?" "I don't know, Etna. I think this place is sooo cute!" Flonne replied, as she seemed to thought their new environment was cute.

Although Flonne thought the place she & Etna were in was really cute, but Etna had a bad feeling about what was going on.
14521.title: The Teddy Bear Door (FAB)

15.content:
"Hey, miss Etna. I got an idea." said Flonne to Etna as she snap her finger.

Then Etna ask to Flonne "What was it, Flonne?"

Then Flonne answer to Etna "We can go to the realm call......"
15.title: Go somewhere else.

info.brief_description: What happens when a couple of demon girls get bored? Pretty much anything, really.
info.description:
Another one of my almost-anything-can-happen interactives, this time featuring the main girls of the first Disgaea game, Etna and Flonne. This takes place after the second game, so pretty much anything can go. Feel free to throw in other characters from the NIS Multiverse as well, or possibly even characters from other universes entirely, though try to at least keep Etna and Flonne as the main characters in this story. Pretty much anything goes, except most male transformation, though I will accept a few exceptions if I don't mind the character being altered.

Feel free to break the 4th wall, too. It happens in the games, especially Makai Kingdom and Disgaea 2.
